name: Cheat's Good
description:
In Cheat's Good, you play as a Test Subject kidnapped by a sadistic scientist who wants to study human intelligence.

Get out of here as fast as you can, and find the Doctor in order to stop him.

Other Contributors : 

Gwendal Lemelle

Assets : Umb16-scif-fi-low-poly-isometric-minipack

Music by : Thomas Tanneau
